name: The Reporter
description:
WASD to Move.

E to interact with characters.

The Reporter is a submission for weekly game jam 132. The theme is "Deep Dive".

You are a reporter named Wilson investigating a suspicious island that is shrouded with a deep secret. The locals seem strange but friendly, perhaps there is a case worth uncovering here? It is said that all that are drawn here are brought here for a reason.

Thanks so much for playing!
